author: affiliates@fandango.com
title: 10. Sleepless (2017) $3.7M
text: non stop action packed, money well spent... Dumb. Completely unbelievable. Incredibly pointless film. A movie made for idiots, by idiots.... By adrianmcgee418 A must see !! Action from beginning to end ... Awful! Expected so much more from Jamie.... By Kbrabham The film had some unbelievable content yet it was entertaining... Better than I expected By Diahanna523 I wasn't expecting much but I thought it ended up being a pretty good movie. I didn't see the twist coming. Lots of action and bloody fights. The kid was only average and Gabrielle Union's part was... Sleepless By mcwwinderweedle While walking into the theatre for this film, I saw a poster for " John Wick 2". Then I saw this movie, while watching Sleepless, I remembered recently rewatching " John Wick" on blu- ray. And... Should have waited for netflix to see this By jpwpainting Great cast but horrible story line it made no sense By zabebreaillsmith
